reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty and feminine, with a great fit for summer and outdoor events that hits right at the ankle. They appreciate its comfort, beautiful colors that pop well in person, and consider it perfect for vacation and summer outings. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some describe it as silk nightgown material, others find it thin and cheap. The size also gets mixed reviews, with some finding the length perfect while others note it's not suitable for larger busts. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good quality dress
items.body: Pretty, soft, comfortable, thicker fabric but still lightweight. Colors are vibrant. Read more
items.author: HC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your next go-to beach trip maxi dress for a fraction of the high-end boutique prices
items.body: I absolutely love this maxi floral dress! I wore it on a recent beach trip for a destination wedding, and it was perfect—super comfy, light, and breezy. The fabric flows beautifully, and the fit is so flattering without feeling restrictive. I also love that it’s easy to dress up or down, making it great for a casual walk on the beach or a nice dinner. I got so many compliments! Definitely a must-have for anyone looking for a stylish yet comfortable summer dress. HIgh quality look for a fraction of the price. I am 5'8, 155lbs, and a true size medium! I ordered a medium and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Busy Mom Wellness Co.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good with the potential to be great!
items.body: For reference, I am 5’2”, 158lbs and a size 36E. I am wearing a LARGE. Was super excited for this dress, however upon first inspection the fabric is super thin and borderlines sheer. I am a curvy girlie so I know that the tie back may be less than flattering but I love the full coverage of the front. It does not have pockets if you were wondering. The color feels more pink focused than red but I do love how bright and cheery this dress is. It has a cut little peek-a-boo cutout in the bust/waist area for a little flirty moment. As someone who is shorter, this dress is a great length that hits right at the ankle. It’s a beautiful dress that I plan to wear for an upcoming cruise. Just thought I would note that I feel like the quality is not justified by the price. Read more
items.author: Elle Deal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Comfortable & Flattering!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I purchased the CUPSHE Women’s Maxi Dress in the beige tropical print and wore it for a wine tasting night — it was perfect! The dress is super cute, very comfortable, and true to size, but since it runs a little big I sized down and it fits in all the right places. The material is soft on the skin, lightweight, and feels high-quality. I loved that it came packaged well, sealed, with no stuffy smell, and was ready to wear after a quick iron. The length is just right and it flows beautifully. I’ll definitely be ordering this dress in more colors! It’s not see through and you can wear it with or without a bra. It has adjustable states. Read more
items.author: Teawanna Teal

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but poorly made.
items.body: Pretty print & colors, but not well tailored and the fabric is poor quality & wrinkles like crazy. No breast pleats. Read more
items.author: anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must get
items.body: Loved this dress for a cruise. Comfy but pretty. Fits well and care is easy. Def travels well Read more
items.author: Christopher Donovan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. You can dress it up or down fabric flows nicely, not see-through. Read more
items.author: Kayjay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits Perfectly and So Comfortable!
items.body: I love this blue floral maxi dress—it fits perfectly and feels cool and comfortable, making it great for wearing around the house. That said, it’s also stylish enough for a night out or a day at the beach. The twisted V-neck and sleeveless design are flattering and breezy for summer. My only small complaint is that even with the 8% discount, I felt the price was a bit high for the dress. But overall, I’m happy with the quality and look. Definitely recommend if you want a versatile and pretty summer dress! Read more
items.author: Tessa27Noel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Striped, Pink Floral, Black Floral, Green Leaf, Red Paisley, Grass Green, Purple Floral, Teal Floral, White Floral, Pink Tropical, Mint Paisley, Navy Tropical, Cranberry Pink, Navy-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
